category: Herbs that Clear Heat and Purge Fire

action.primary: Clears Heat, resolves toxicity, reduces abscesses and stops pain

indications: Fire toxicity with Intestinal abscess and skin lesions with Heat, swelling and pain (Chuang Yung) (internal and topical)

action.primary: Invigorates the Blood and disperses Stasis

useCases: Intestinal abscess with a stronger effect.
Abscess and swelling due to Heat toxin.
Abscess and swelling due to Heat toxin.
Post traumatic pain or dysmenorrhea due to Blood Stasis.
Gynecological abdominal pain from Blood Stasis.
Abdominal pain due to Blood Stasis.
Drains Dampness and dispels excessive vaginal discharge.

notes: According to some sources, this herb is not often used .
It is mostly used for gastrointestinal problems, especially worms and cancer and for rheumatism.
This herb is a non-toxic anthelmintic.
It is said to be useful for abdominal bacterial infection.
Some sources say that this herb dispels Wind and opens the channels.

Hong Teng, Hb. Houttuyniae #{YuXingCao} Yu Xing Cao and Hb. Patriniae #{BaiJiangCao} Bai Jiang Cao all are cooling, resolve toxicity, strongly disperse Blood and cool Blood Heat, and are all specific for treating Intestinal abscess. Hong Teng focuses on both the Intestines and breasts, Yu Xing Cao focuses on the Lungs and Bai Jiang Cao on the Intestines. They are often used together to treat gynecological abdominal pain from Blood Stasis.

Both Hong Teng and Caulis Spatholobi #{JiXueTeng} Ji Xue Teng are frequently used together for abdominal pain due to Blood Stasis. They both invigorate the Blood, however Ji Xue Teng also supplements and has a relatively gentle pain-relieving action. Hong Teng is mores dispersing, cooling and able to resolve toxicity. It is an essential herb for abdominal pain due to pelvic inflammation.

Both Hong Teng and Caulis Lonicerae #{RenDongTeng} Ren Dong Teng resolve toxicity, reduce sores, clear Heat, and treat Bi Syndrome and abdominal pain. Ren Dong Teng clears Wind-Heat from the collaterals to stop pain while Hong Teng resolves toxicity, invigorates Blood, stops pain and treats breast and abdominal abscesses.
